mapper.select: SELECT no, title, name, hit, reg_date, user_no, order_no, depth, group_no FROM (SELECT rownum rn, no, title, name, hit, reg_date, user_no, order_no, depth, group_no FROM (SELECT b.no no, b.title title, u.name name, b.hit hit, to_char(b.reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') reg_date, b.user_no user_no, b.group_no group_no, b.depth depth, b.order_no order_no FROM replyboard b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by group_no desc, order_no ASC)) where rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}

select b.no no, b.title title, b.content content, b.hit hit, b.reg_date reg_date, b.user_no user_no, b.depth depth, b.order_no, b.group_no, u.name name from replyboard b, users u where b.user_no = u.no(+) and b.no = #{no}
mapper.update: update replyboard set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, reg_date = sysdate where no = #{no}
mapper.delete: delete replyboard where no = #{no} and user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.select: SELECT no, title, name, hit, reg_date, user_no FROM (SELECT rownum rn, no, title, name, hit, reg_date, user_no FROM (SELECT b.no no, b.title title, u.name name, b.hit hit, to_char(b.reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') reg_date, b.user_no user_no FROM replyboard b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by no desc)) where rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}
select count(*) count from replyboard where title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update replyboard set hit = hit + 1 where no = #{no}
